0.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   The stone-lined passage merges into natural caves here.  Lichen clings
to the cave walls in long strands and the air is humid.  The natural
floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass northwest and
southwest.  A nook has been carved into the wall of the cave which is
just big enough to hold a spear.

1.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
northeast and southeast.

2.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
northwest and southeast.

3.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
northwest and east.

4.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   The natural cave passage continues northeast here, but a new passage
has been cut into the rock to the southeast.  The humid air is cooled at
this juncture by a faint breeze coming from the southeast, almost as if
there is a massive cavern down that way with running water.

5.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
north, east and southwest.

6.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
south and northwest. To the northeast is a smaller cave.

7.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
southeast and northeast. To the east is a smaller cave.

8.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
southwest and east. To the northwest is a large cave--you can see light
from a fire casting shadows on the walls here and some loud hissing and
chittering noises that could possibly be voices.

9.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
east and west.

10.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
west and southeast. To the south is a smaller cave.

11.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
south and northwest.

12.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
north and southwest. To the west is a smaller cave.

13.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
west and northeast.

14.name: Lizardman Caves under Dark Horn Hill
desc: "   You are standing in a natural passage in a cave system under Dark Horn
Hill.  Lichen clings to the walls in long strands and the air is humid.
The natural floor here is covered in large reptilian tracks that pass
east and west. To the north is a smaller cave.

15.name: A Lizardman Abode
desc: "   You are standing in a small, natural cave.  The floor is littered with
leaf mould and a nest has been fashioned from sticks, twigs and branches.
This is probably where some of the lizardmen live.

16.name: A Lizardman Abode
desc: "   You are standing in a small, natural cave.  The floor is littered with
leaf mould and a nest has been fashioned from sticks, twigs and branches.
This is probably where some of the lizardmen live.

17.name: The Lizardman Chieftan's Hall
desc: "   You are standing in a long natural cavern.  A fire burns in a pit in
the centre of the cavern.  Beyond the fire a large chair, possibly a
throne, has been fashioned from bronze and wood--although primitive, it
is no less impressive.  The whole cavern looks like it could host quite
a lot of lizardmen!

18.name: A Lizardman Abode
desc: "   You are standing in a small, natural cave.  The floor is littered with
leaf mould and a nest has been fashioned from sticks, twigs and branches.
This is probably where some of the lizardmen live.

19.name: A Lizardman Smithy
desc: "   You are standing in a primitive smithy.  A small fire-pit, lined with
fire-blackened clay, is connected to two primitive air-pumps via oiled-
leather tubes.  The heat is just as hot in here as it would be in a
normal, civilised, smithy.  Tin and copper alloys line the walls and
several items of bronze sit on a bench near the far wall.

20.name: A Lizardman Abode
desc: "   You are standing in a small, natural cave.  The floor is littered with
leaf mould and a nest has been fashioned from sticks, twigs and branches.
This is probably where some of the lizardmen live.

21.name: The Sahuagin Guard Post
desc: "   This crudely-cut cut corridor has been shaped for defence.  The floor
pitches upwards slightly, giving advantage to the defenders and wicker
panels have been positioned across the cave to act as barriers.  Behind
the panels several sahuagin could defend this place long enough to raise
the intruder alarm and bring in backup.

22.name: Entrance to the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing at the top of a set of crudely cut stone steps.  Some
wisps of mist swirl and eddy at your feet.  The walls here are covered in
graffiti; all of which seems to revolve around a theme of a cross-legged
frog creature, shining with light.  Some crude runes have been scrawled
under the figure.  You can descend the steps towards the light, or turn
back to the lizardman caverns.
K R O C O A T L

23.name: Before the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing at the back of a massive, naturally oval cavern.  The
floor is a dark-black granite that has been highly polished.  The walls
extend away from you in either direction and are equally as impressive.
Far to the south you can see a figure kneeling, its arms outspread, and
beyond a massive cloud of fog or steam that rises up from what could only
be a cavity and up to the ceiling of the cavern.  Could this be the source
of that strange fog outside in the bog?  Behind the cloud you can just
make a giant statue of a tall frog creature carved in to the opposite
wall.  All around lizardman and sahaugin kneel in prayer.  This must be a
massive temple!  Uh oh!

24.name: In the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor inside a massive
temple.  To the south a billowing cloud of fog rises out of a cavity and
seeps into the roof of the cavern.  Beyond that a haunting statue of a
frog has been carved in to the south wall, it's eyes always on you.
Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in
grey stands before the cavity beckoning the mist up.

25.name: In the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor inside a massive
temple.  To the south a billowing cloud of fog rises out of a cavity and
seeps into the roof of the cavern.  Beyond that a haunting statue of a
frog has been carved in to the south wall, it's eyes always on you.
Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in
grey stands before the cavity beckoning the mist up.

26.name: In the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor inside a massive
temple.  To the south a billowing cloud of fog rises out of a cavity and
seeps into the roof of the cavern.  Beyond that a haunting statue of a
frog has been carved in to the south wall, it's eyes always on you.
Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in
grey stands before the cavity beckoning the mist up.

Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in

Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in

Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in

31.name: In the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor inside a massive
temple.  To the south a billowing cloud of fog rises out of a cavity and
seeps into the roof of the cavern.  Beyond that a haunting statue of a
frog has been carved in to the south wall, it's eyes always on you.
Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in
grey stands before the cavity beckoning the mist up.

32.name: In the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor inside a massive
temple.  To the south a billowing cloud of fog rises out of a cavity and
seeps into the roof of the cavern.  Beyond that a haunting statue of a
frog has been carved in to the south wall, it's eyes always on you.
Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in
grey stands before the cavity beckoning the mist up.

33.name: In the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor inside a massive
temple.  To the south a billowing cloud of fog rises out of a cavity and
seeps into the roof of the cavern.  Beyond that a haunting statue of a
frog has been carved in to the south wall, it's eyes always on you.
Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in
grey stands before the cavity beckoning the mist up.

34.name: In the Temple of the Frog Next to the Abyssal Fall
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor.  Just to the south
of you the cavern opens up into an abyssal drop, from which slowly rises
the never end of cloud of fog.  Looking down you can see anything.  Only
the bravest of souls would brave such a drop.  Looking east you can see a
stone gantry that hangs perilously from the edge of the temple.  It seems
to reach almost to the middle.  On the end of the gantry the figure robed
in grey continues to beckon forth the mists.

35.name: In the Temple of the Frog before the Perilous Gantry
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor.  Just to the south
of you the cavern opens up into an abyssal drop, from which slowly rises
the never end of cloud of fog.  A gantry juts out from the temple and out
over the abyss.  Dare you try it?  On the end of the gantry the figure
robed in grey continues to beckon forth the mists.
The gantry creaks and groans under your weight!

36.name: In the Temple of the Frog Next to the Abyssal Fall
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor.  Just to the south
of you the cavern opens up into an abyssal drop, from which slowly rises
the never end of cloud of fog.  Looking down you can see anything.  Only
the bravest of souls would brave such a drop.  Looking west you can see a
stone gantry that hangs perilously from the edge of the temple.  It seems
to reach almost to the middle.  On the end of the gantry the figure robed
in grey continues to beckon forth the mists.

37.name: In the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor inside a massive
temple.  To the south a billowing cloud of fog rises out of a cavity and
seeps into the roof of the cavern.  Beyond that a haunting statue of a
frog has been carved in to the south wall, it's eyes always on you.
Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in
grey stands before the cavity beckoning the mist up.

38.name: In the Temple of the Frog
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor inside a massive
temple.  To the south a billowing cloud of fog rises out of a cavity and
seeps into the roof of the cavern.  Beyond that a haunting statue of a
frog has been carved in to the south wall, it's eyes always on you.
Sahuagin and lizardman are everywhere, worshipping, and a figure robed in
grey stands before the cavity beckoning the mist up.

39.name: In the Temple of the Frog on a Narrow Ledge
desc: "   You are standing on a narrow ledge of polished black stone.  There is
not a lot of room here.  To the east the mist rises and you can make out
the figure robed in grey on the gantry in the centre of the mire.  The
ledge continues south.  A small opening to the west leads into a room for
one of the sahuagin priests.

40.name: In the Temple of the Frog Next to the Abyssal Fall
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor.  Just to the south
of you the cavern opens up into an abyssal drop, from which slowly rises
the never end of cloud of fog.  Looking down you can see anything.  Only
the bravest of souls would brave such a drop.  Looking east you can see a
stone gantry that hangs perilously from the edge of the temple.  It seems
to reach almost to the middle.  On the end of the gantry the figure robed
in grey continues to beckon forth the mists.

41.name: In the Temple of the Frog Next to the Abyssal Fall
desc: "   You are standing on a polished black granite floor.  Just to the south
of you the cavern opens up into an abyssal drop, from which slowly rises
the never end of cloud of fog.  Looking down you can see anything.  Only
the bravest of souls would brave such a drop.  Looking west you can see a
stone gantry that hangs perilously from the edge of the temple.  It seems
to reach almost to the middle.  On the end of the gantry the figure robed
in grey continues to beckon forth the mists.

42.name: In the Temple of the Frog on a Narrow Ledge
desc: "   You are standing on a narrow ledge of polished black stone.  There is
not a lot of room here.  To the west the mist rises and you can make out
the figure robed in grey on the gantry in the centre of the mire.  The
ledge continues south.  A small opening to the east leads into a room for
one of the sahuagin priests.

43.name: In the Temple of the Frog on a Narrow Ledge
desc: "   You are standing on a narrow ledge of polished black stone.  There is
not a lot of room here.  To the east the mist rises and you can make out
the figure robed in grey on the gantry in the centre of the mire.  The
ledge continues southeast.

44.name: In the Temple of the Frog on a Narrow Ledge
desc: "   You are standing on a narrow ledge of polished black stone.  There is
not a lot of room here.  To the east the mist rises and you can make out
the figure robed in grey on the gantry in the centre of the mire.  The
ledge continues southeast.  A small opening to the southwest leads into a
room for one of the sahuagin priests.

45.name: In the Temple of the Frog on a Narrow Ledge
desc: "   You are standing on a narrow ledge of polished black stone.  There is
not a lot of room here.  To the north the mist rises and you can make out
the figure robed in grey on the gantry in the centre of the mire.  The
ledge continues east.

46.name: In the Temple of the Frog on a Narrow Ledge
desc: "   You are standing on a narrow ledge of polished black stone.  There is
not a lot of room here.  To the north the mist rises and you can make out
the figure robed in grey on the gantry in the centre of the mire.  The
ledge continues east and west.  A small opening to the south leads into a
plush-looking room for one of the sahuagin priests.

47.name: In the Temple of the Frog on a Narrow Ledge
desc: "   You are standing on a narrow ledge of polished black stone.  There is
not a lot of room here.  To the north the mist rises and you can make out
the figure robed in grey on the gantry in the centre of the mire.  The
ledge continues west.

48.name: In the Temple of the Frog on a Narrow Ledge
desc: "   You are standing on a narrow ledge of polished black stone.  There is
not a lot of room here.  To the west the mist rises and you can make out
the figure robed in grey on the gantry in the centre of the mire.  The
ledge continues southwest.  A small opening to the southeast leads into a
room for one of the sahuagin priests.

49.name: In the Temple of the Frog on a Narrow Ledge
desc: "   You are standing on a narrow ledge of polished black stone.  There is
not a lot of room here.  To the west the mist rises and you can make out
the figure robed in grey on the gantry in the centre of the mire.  The
ledge continues southwest.

50.name: On the Perilous Gantry Over The Abyssal Fall
desc: "   Woah!  You gantry rocks up and down perilously and for a brief second
or two you heart stops as you think its about to break.  Then the stone
beneath your feet stabilises and you let out an explosive breath.  All
around you the fog rises.  Just to the south the strange figure robed in
grey continues to beckon the mist forth from the Abyss.
The gantry creaks and groans under your weight!
The gantry creaks and groans under your weight!

51.name: On the Perilous Gantry Over The Abyssal Fall
desc: "   Shit!  The gantry rocks and groans loudly.  You jump as you hear snaps
and cracks!  Uh oh!  All around you are surrounded by fog and can no long
-er make out the temple details.  The gantry is circular here and the
figure robed in grey has not noticed you...  Looking down you think you
make out what could be light reflecting off water... You could jump from
here you think.  Perhaps that is where the fog comes from?  Down there?
Arrrrrrgggggggghhhhhhhhhhh!
The gantry creaks and groans under your weight!

52.name: A Sahuagin Priest Room
desc: "   You are standing in dark, damp room.  The decor is spartan.  There is
not even an idol of a frog for you to loot.  That's why you came in here
wasn't it?

53.name: A Sahuagin Priest Room
desc: "   You are standing in dark, damp room.  The decor is spartan.  There is
not even an idol of a frog for you to loot.  That's why you came in here
wasn't it?

54.name: The Sahuagin High Priest Room
desc: "   You are standing in light, damp room.  The decor is plush and opulent
compared to the rest of the priestly rooms.  That said, a narrow chair
and a gold idol of the frog god is all you can spy.

55.name: A Sahuagin Priest Room
desc: "   You are standing in dark, damp room.  The decor is spartan.  There is
not even an idol of a frog for you to loot.  That's why you came in here
wasn't it?

56.name: A Sahuagin Priest Room
desc: "   You are standing in dark, damp room.  The decor is spartan.  There is
not even an idol of a frog for you to loot.  That's why you came in here
wasn't it?

57.name: Falling Through the Air!
desc: You make a running jump off the gantry!  Your legs cartwheel as you drop!
Yeeeeeeeooooooooooooooooooaaaaaaaaaaaagggggggghhhhhhhhh!!!!

58.name: Falling Through the Air!
desc: You realise you're screaming as you fall!  This is a LONG drop!
SPLASH! That was LUCKY!

59.name: The Surface of the Underground Lake
desc: "   You are swimming at the surface of an underground lake.  Everything is
in darkness.  All around you the water bubbles gently and fog rises from
the water.  Maybe the source of the fog is below you?  The lake extends
off to the north, south, east and west.

60.name: The Surface of the Underground Lake
desc: "   You are swimming at the surface of an underground lake.  Everything is
in darkness.  All around you the water bubbles gently and fog rises from
the water.  Maybe the source of the fog is below you?  A dark wall rises
up here, but it is completely smooth and offers no hand holds.  The wall
curves off to the southwest and southeast.

61.name: The Surface of the Underground Lake
desc: "   You are swimming at the surface of an underground lake.  Everything is
in darkness.  All around you the water bubbles gently and fog rises from
the water.  Maybe the source of the fog is below you?  A dark wall rises
up here, but it is completely smooth and offers no hand holds.  The wall
curves off to the northeast and northwest.

62.name: The Surface of the Underground Lake
desc: "   You are swimming at the surface of an underground lake.  Everything is
in darkness.  All around you the water bubbles gently and fog rises from
the water.  Maybe the source of the fog is below you?  A dark wall rises
up here, but it is completely smooth and offers no hand holds.  The wall
curves off to the southwest and northwest.

63.name: The Surface of the Underground Lake
desc: "   You are swimming at the surface of an underground lake.  Everything is
in darkness.  All around you the water bubbles gently and fog rises from
the water.  Maybe the source of the fog is below you?  A dark wall rises
up here, but it is completely smooth and offers no hand holds.  The wall
curves off to the northeast and southeast.

64.name: The Bottom of the Underground Lake
desc: "   You are swimming at the bottom of the lake.  Directly below you is a
small opening from which bubbles pour in a steady stream.  The opening is
very, very narrow but you think you can wiggle your way in...

65.name: A Narrow Water Filled Tunnel
desc: "   You are in a very narrow, water-filled tunnel.  It is lined with grey
granite and cloudy bubbles stream past you and up towards the under-
ground lake.  You hope this tunnel ends soon...  Drowning in this tight,
confined space would not be pleasant.

66.name: A Narrow Water Filled Tunnel
desc: "   You are in a very narrow, water-filled tunnel.  It is lined with grey
granite and cloudy bubbles stream past you and back towards the under-
ground lake.  You hope this tunnel ends soon...  Drowning in this tight,
confined space would not be pleasant.

67.name: A Narrow Water Filled Tunnel
desc: "   You are in a very narrow, water-filled tunnel.  Above you is a rusting
iron grate, through which cloudy bubbles stream.  Hopefully you can open
the grate and you won't be trapped in this hellish tunnel!

68.name: Inside the Sahuagin Outpost
desc: "   You are standing at the end of a very damp and very cold corridor.  To
the south you can make out a light shining, but it isn't powerful enough
to illuminate your surroundings.  The floor, walls and ceilings are all
made of unremarkable grey granite.  Water seeps through the cracks in the
roof and drips down on to the floor.  A fine mist flows along the centre
of the floor and into the grate at your feet.  The corridor continues to
the south or you can re-enter the underground lake via the iron grate.

69.name: Inside the Sahuagin Outpost
desc: "   You are standing in a very damp and very cold corridor.  To the south
you can make out a light shining, but it isn't powerful enough for you to
pick out your surroundings without your own light source.  The floor,
walls and ceiling are all made of unremarkable grey granite.  Water seeps
through the cracks in the roof and drips down on to the floor.  A fine
mist flows along the centre of floor from south to north.  The corridor
continues to the south.  To the west is an open store room and to the
east is an open tank full of fish and other creatures.

70.name: A Sahuagin Store Room
desc: "   This room is very cold and very damp.  The walls, floor and ceiling
are all made of the same grey granite.  Water is everywhere and the wood
of the barrels filled with salted fish and the wooden racks holding fish
spears are all sodden.  You can exit back to the corridor to the east.

71.name: A Sahuagin Larder Tank
desc: "   You step off the edge of the corridor and into a stone tank of ice-cold
water.  Are you stupid?  Who knows what could be in here?  You feel some-
thing brush your leg...  Uh oh!  You can climb out of the tank and back
to the corridor.

72.name: Inside the Sahuagin Outpost
desc: "   You are standing in a very damp and very cold corridor.  To the south
you can make out a light shining, but it isn't powerful enough for you to
pick out your surroundings without your own light source.  The floor,
walls and ceiling are all made of unremarkable grey granite.  Water seeps
through the cracks in the roof and drips down on to the floor.  A fine
mist flows along the centre of floor from south to north.  The corridor
continues to the south.

73.name: Inside the Sahuagin Outpost
desc: "   You are standing in a very damp and very cold corridor.  To the south
you can make out a light shining, but it isn't powerful enough for you to
pick out your surroundings without your own light source.  The floor,
walls and ceiling are all made of unremarkable grey granite.  Water seeps
through the cracks in the roof and drips down on to the floor.  A fine
mist flows along the centre of floor from south to north.  The corridor
continues to the south.

74.name: Inside the Sahuagin Outpost
desc: "   You are standing in a very damp and very cold corridor.  The floor,
walls and ceiling are all made of unremarkable grey granite.  Water seeps
through the cracks in the roof and drips down on to the floor.  There is
a light shining here, illuminating three doors to the east, south and
west.  The door to the east is made of rusting iron but looks like it
could be very sturdy.  The door to the south is made of delicate deep-sea
kelp and the fine mist broils from under the door and flows off to the
north.  The door to the west is made of damp, rotting wood and is more
than likely to fall apart in your hand.  The corridor continues to the
north.

75.name: A Sahuagin War Room
desc: "   You are standing in a wide room made of the same, dull, grey granite.
Water cascades down the walls in rivlets that pool on the floor before
seeping away.  In the centre of the room is a table surrounded by chairs
and one wall hosts a weapon rack full of fish spears.  On the table is
a map of the bog.  To the northwest and southwest plain wooden doors
block your progress.

76.name: A Sahuagin Warriors Barracks
desc: "   You are standing a round chamber made of the same grey granite as the
rest of this place.  Water drips down the walls and everything is wet and
damp.  Several lillypads line the floor.  Is this what the sahuagin sleep
on?

77.name: A Sahuagin Warriors Barracks
desc: "   You are standing a round chamber made of the same grey granite as the
rest of this place.  Water drips down the walls and everything is wet and
damp.  Several lillypads line the floor.  Is this what the sahuagin sleep
on?

78.name: A Sahuagin Prison
desc: "   You are standing in a small room dominated by a square table.  A set
of dice made from the knuckle of some poor sea-creature lay on the table.
The walls, floor and ceiling are all made of the same grey granite as the
rest of this place and even here water drips in a never ending cascade.
To the northeast and southeast two low doors made of dirty, rusting iron
bar your passage.

79.name: A Sahuagin Prison Cell
desc: "   This is a very low room made of the same grey granite.  A bucket, full
of some unidentified terror, dominates a corner.  Water drips from every-
where. There isn't much else to see.  You hope that the cell didn't lock
after it shut behind you!

80.name: A Sahuagin Prison Cell
desc: "   This is a very low room made of the same grey granite.  A bucket, full
of some unidentified terror, dominates a corner.  Water drips from every-
where. There isn't much else to see.  You hope that the cell didn't lock
after it shut behind you!

81.name: Temple of the Death Slaad
desc: "   The ceiling here is much higher than the rest of the complex, and the
walls and floor are free from damp.  Several pews line the sides of the
walls.  To the south of the room is a pulpit where something obviously
gives sermons, and beyond you can make out a large black altar.  A fine
mist seeps from the south and passes under the door to the north.

82.name: Altar of the Death Slaad
desc: "   You are standing in domed chamber.  An altar dominates the middle of
the room.  It is highly decorated with pictures of the frog creatures you
have become so familiar with.  To the southern end of the chamber a fine
mist pours out of a hole in the floor, passes around the altar and seeps
its way north.  The hole is surrounded by runes in gold on black.  You
reckon you could fit through it... If you tried!

83.name: The Source of The Dark Wind
desc: "   Phew!  That was a tight squeeze to fit through that hole.  Luckily the
floor wasn't very deep, so you can still reach the hole if you jump and
climb back out.  This whole room is cloudy with mist.  The walls glow a
deep blue and everything appears eldritch and eerie.  The mist pours from
a black gap in the floor here.  It is only the size of a fist and no way
could you squeeze in it.  Peering in all you see is mist and fog.  You
think you can hear screams and wails if you close your eyes and, with all
your might, concentrate on the sounds...  Could be there is no way to
stop the mist rising from the hole.  But at least you found the source!
A job well done, you think, and give yourself a well deserved pat on the
back.
